page.title: 05 A Day in the life of Mark D
page.content: 7.30 Got up. 7.45 Breakfast. 7.55 Play Snooker. 8.05 Dress and ready for School. 8.20 Walk to School Bus. 8.40 Played football in the playground. 8.50 Start School and Assembly. 9.30 Wrote about Life science Research visit. 10.30 Played Footballin play ground. 10.45 Played Farmer on the Computer. 11.00 Cut up paper with the Guillotine. 12.00 Eat Packed Lunch. 12.30 Played football in the playground. 1.00 Draw a picture of live Kittens. 2.00 Cut paper. 2.15 Playtime. 2.30 Gave out books and cut paper. 2.55 Teacher talked about tommorow. 3.05 Travel home on School bus.
